@japhater & @kakanman: MKV is the defacto-standard now for all high-definition movies, videos, and tv shows transmitted on torrents. it's 5000x superior to AVI in every single way (read the wikipedia pages if you're confused) and people stopped using AVI in like, 2005.

The biggest difference is... mkv supports 5.1, 6.1, and 7.1 channel audio, however AVI only supports 2 channel stereo.
